subject_terms_3: Instrumental music Raffles, Sophia, Lady Raffles, Thomas Stamford
physical_appearance: The image shows the front cover of a book. The cover is light brown in colour and it looks faded and worn out, with several white patches on it. The spine of the book is in black. There are no inscriptions like the title and publisher on the front cover of the book.
sgcool_label_text: This is a hardbound compilation of piano sheet music bearing the armorial booklate of Sir Thomas Stamford Raffles. Contained within is a page bearing his wife Sophia's handwritten playlist, possibly of her favourite songs. Lady Sophia Raffles, who married Sir Stamford Raffles in 1817, was an accomplished pianist.
title_text: Piano sheet music from the collection of Sir Stamford Raffles Compilation of piano sheet music from the collection of Sir Stamford Raffles
subject_terms_2: Books Sheet music Raffles, Sophia, Lady, 1786-1858 Raffles, Thomas Stamford Sir, 1781-1826
